targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE (("change" = '560445' OR "change" = '567224' OR "change" = '564291' OR "change" = '564285' ) AND "voting" = 'True' AND "passed" = 'False') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "duration", "result", "log_url" FROM "autogen"."build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "job_name", "branch", "pipeline", "change"

SELECT "branch", "pipeline", "change", "job_name", "log_link",  "duration", "cloud", "region" FROM "autogen"."build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND ("change" = '560445' OR "change" = '567224' OR "change" = '564291' OR "change" = '564285') AND "voting" = 'True') AND $timeFilter

alert.name: Upstream zuul max enqueued time alert

alert.name: RDO zuul max enqueued time alert
alert.message: A lot of jobs at RDO openstack-check pipeline, check out https://review.rdoproject.org/zuul/.

alert.name: Upstream gate jobs alert
alert.message: Some jobs are failing in the last 24h
